TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpCachePolicyBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 作為類別的基底類別，這些類別包含設定快取特定 HTTP 標頭以及控制 ASP.NET 頁面輸出快取的方法。

span.span: Serves as the base class for classes that contain methods for setting cache-specific HTTP headers and for controlling the ASP.NET page output cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象類別，其中包含相同的成員類別。The class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the class. 類別可讓您建立衍生的類別，它就像是類別，但您可以自訂，而且 ASP.NET 管線外運作。The class lets you create derived classes that are like the class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. 當您執行單元測試時，通常會使用衍生的類別來實作自訂行為符合您要測試的案例使用的成員。When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members with customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing. 類別衍生自 類別。The class derives from the class. 類別可做為包裝函式類別。The class serves as a wrapper for the class. 在執行階段，因此您通常使用的執行個體類別來呼叫的成員物件。At run time, you typically use an instance of the class to call members of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: protected HttpCachePolicyBase ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: HttpCachePolicyBase();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化這個類別，以供繼承的類別執行個體使用。

span.span: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.

summary.span: 這個建構函式只能由繼承的類別呼叫。

span.span: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

span.span: The object that will handle the request.

param.span: 傳遞至 委派的使用者提供資料。

span.span: The user-supplied data that is passed to the delegate.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，註冊目前回應的驗證回呼。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, registers a validation callback for the current response.
Always.

span.span: to direct the client browser to store responses in the browser history cache; otherwise .

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，在瀏覽器記錄快取中提供回應，而不考慮伺服器的 設定。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, makes the response available in the browser history cache, regardless of the setting made on the server.
Always.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，將 標頭設定為其中一個 值。
